QuestData.Title: Diaries of the Dead
QuestData.Description:
<The enchantments preserving this journal are intact, but fading. It appears to be the diary of a citizen of the city. You turn to a random page...>
Then he had the audacity to enter our summoning circle and demand we evict his study space at once. Who willingly steps into the chaos of a summoning ritual? He is mad. We call him that now -- Mad Mardivas.
Of course, he was bitten on the leg by a lesser summon, and...
<It continues -- not useful, but you surmise there may be more such tomes.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Search Zin-Azshari in Nazjatar for additional diaries.

Objectives.Objective: Find another journal in the city ruins.
